episodesJson.title: I Was a Teenage Werebear (with Sean Paul Lockhart, aka Brent Corrigan)
episodesJson.description: This week, we were joined by the incomparable Sean Paul Lockhart (Brent Corrigan if you're nasty) to talk about the 2011 featurette I Was a Teenage Werebear. A movie he was in! Guys, I'm geeking out over here.
topics: And we get real about some stuff
